sentences.translation: 坚韧执着会带来成功的。

sentences.sentence: There was no self-promotion,only method and doggedness.
sentences.translation: 不靠自我的提升，他只靠方法和坚持。

sentences.sentence: I did all this with unnatural haste and doggedness; it was all too much for me.
sentences.translation: 我异常匆忙而固执地做了这一切；可真给我忙得够呛。
